pages.text: The $(8)Wrench-O-Matic is a handy device which allows mass reconfiguration of machines within the world.

The Wrench-O-Matic currently has 3 modes of operation, which can be switched by SHIFT-RIGHT CLICKING with it when not looking at anything. They are:$(li)$(9)Interact Mode,$() which rotates machines 90Â°.$(li)$(2)Wrench Mode,$() which allows changing of which side of a Pipe the Connector is located on, or creates new Connectors.$(li)$(4)Wrath Mode,$() which increases the damage and knockback of the Wrench.$(br)You can also apply $(l:items/enchantments#engineersfury)Engineer's Fury$() to enhance Wrath Mode.
